definition: to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: One of its foremost proponents is the country's most bankable director, Feng Xiaogang.
sentences.chinese: 其中最著名的拥护者是在中国最卖座的导演冯小刚。

sentences.english: May scientists who supported the prodution of atomic bombs are advocates of peace.
sentences.chinese: 许多支持生产原子弹的科学家是和平的拥护者。

sentences.english: Ustinov later became a staunch6 advocate for UNESCO.
sentences.chinese: 乌斯季诺夫后来成为联合国教科文组织的坚定拥护者。

sentences.english: Loyalist forces using tanks and rockets outgunned the rebel groups.
sentences.chinese: 扎卡菲拥护者使用坦克和火箭重火力压倒了反对者。

sentences.english: Each of the several chief theories has its host of zealous partisans .
sentences.chinese: 那几种主要见解，每种都有许多热烈的拥护者。

sentences.english: Some advocates of the tax, however, eye broader benefits.
sentences.chinese: 然而，物业税的拥护者着眼于更宽的利益。

sentences.english: Federalists are convinced this will speed up European integration.
sentences.chinese: 联邦制拥护者相信这将加快欧洲一体化进程。

sentences.english: You are a vocal proponent for a cause.
sentences.chinese: 你成为了某一目标的口头拥护者。

sentences.english: As a methodist he was a fervent advocate of temperance .
sentences.chinese: 身为一名卫理公会教徒，他是禁欲的热情拥护者。

sentences.english: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的主要拥护者。

sentences.english: He is a stout supporter of the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的坚决拥护者。

sentences.english: Also rugby and handball have their adherents.
sentences.chinese: 橄榄球和手球同样也有他们的拥护者。

sentences.english: The Republican charges that Obama has embraced a “declinist vision.”
sentences.chinese: 这位共和党人指责奥巴马是“衰落主义”的拥护者。

sentences.english: He is a keen advocate of park-and-ride schemes.
sentences.chinese: 他是“停车再换乘”计划的热情拥护者。

sentences.english: Advocates find their calling on the mediational side of diplomatic intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 拥护者在策略智慧的调停方面，找到了他们的定位。

sentences.english: I am pro-police — always have been and always will be.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个警察的拥护者，现在是，将来也是。

definition: to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
